nodes.text: The Grand Protector of the Rodians, or Inta'si'rin'na in Rodese, was the leader of Rodia and the Rodian species. The Grand Protector's power depended on his ability to keep power in his tribe.

One of the most notable Grand Protectors was Harido Kavila, who invented Rodian Theater and is credited with preventing the Rodians from wiping each other out. Another notable Protector was Navik, Protector during the New Republic.
